title: Worlds Alt Streams: Group Stage Week 2
body: Below you can find a full schedule for the alternate streams we're showcasing during Week 2 of the Worlds Group Stage. You can catch the 2016 World Championship alternate streams on Twitch, YouTube and Lolesports starting October 6 at 4 PM PT.

replies.body:
Tune in this week and see which teams advance and which ones don't! Will TSM advance? Will C9 play anymore 70+ minute long games? Will SKT get upset again? Will a Wildcard team actually advance?! 

WATCH TO FIND OUT!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I want to watch SummonerBallZ! Maybe Meteos will bring back his SSJ hair this week!?
You misspelled "Atlus" on Game 2 of Day 7.

What factors do you consider when deciding to do a FoW stream, in regards to which team you'll show fog for? Is it random or what? I love all of the alternate streams, hope to see this for other events in the future. Especially for someone like me who likes to re-watch certain matches, now I get an alternate casting/viewing experience. Real cool.
I feel like they probably watch people's actions when there's no vision or like focus on vision and how players use the fog of war to make plays
